articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: This free TV comes with two screens - The Verge
articles.description: Ilya Pozin, the co-founder of Pluto TV, is launching a free, ad-supported TV set that comes with two displays: a 55-inch one for viewing and a slim Smart Display for ads and widgets.
articles.content:
